Guest Molecules.Mechanism: Steric trapping after formation inside cages

Other Information.Additional Info: The IL is formed inside the ZIF-8 cages via the reaction of precursors 1-methylimidazole and 1-bromobutane.

Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: IL loading: 2.7 ion pairs per cage (powder), 2.8-3.4 ion pairs per cage (film)

Other Information.Additional Info: The [bmim]Br@ZIF-8 composite demonstrates reduced BET surface area (from 1671 to 411 m²/g) and can be reversibly loaded/unloaded without damaging the ZIF-8 host.
